Description:
Sim, a 35-year-old married farmer, lives in the Kandal province. She is blessed with a dependent child who is too young to attend school. Her family’s income comes from growing rice and working as a garment worker. Sim earns about 10 USD per day and can save about 5 USD each day.

As she is in need of working capital, Sim is now leading a group of three members to get loan from VisionFund. She is going to use her loan to buy organic fertilizer to improve her farmland. She hopes that she can generate more income to improve her living conditions, and to send her children to school.
Use: to buy organic fertilizer to improve her farmland and gain more output.
Keywords:
Based on the information, relevant keywords include:

Loans
Farmer
Sustainable Agriculture
Food Security
Rural Development
